entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
